metadata.title: CVE-2023-50471 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
cJSON v1.7.16 was discovered to contain a segmentation violation via thefunction cJSON_InsertItemInArray at cJSON.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-50471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcjson1 - 1.7.17-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cjson package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.17-1').
